revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_ClericAttack}} '''A_ClericAttack'''
Shoots a {{Class|HolyMissile}} from the calling actor's position and a relative height of 40 map units and plays the sound "HolySymbolFire" on the WEAPON channel. The holy missile's {{c|tracer}} field is explicitly nulled.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ClericBoss}} and derived classes.
{{DEFAULTSORT:ClericAttack}}[[Category:Decorate Classic attack functions]] [[category:Decorate Hexen functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]
